description: ff. 92. 209 x 158; 158 x 102 mm. 29 lin. Ṣafar 1121, Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Laṭīf al-Ḥanbalī; on fol. 1a note of ownership by Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī al-Manīnī. Gloss on al-Taftāzānīʼs commentary: Brockelmann, GAL, S I, 760 (gloss w); Fihrist al-makhṭūṭāt (1961-63), III, 176; Fihris al-kutub al-mawjūdah bi-al-Maktabah al-Azharīyah, III, 333. Incip.: ... الحمد لله الذى ثبت اصول الدىن باقوال المرشدىن ... وبعد فىقول ... هذه تقرىرات واىضاحات ... من تقرىرات شىخنا ... شمس الدىن محمد بن على القاىاتى .... وزدت من المنقول والمعقول ما رأىت ان ىحتاج الىه ... وسمىتها النکت
author: Biqāʻī, Ibrāhīm ibn ʻUmar, 1406 or 1407-1480
creator: Biqāʻī, Ibrāhīm ibn ʻUmar, 1406 or 1407-1480
subject: Taftāzānī, Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar, 1322-1389?—Sharḥ al-ʻAqāʼid al-Nasafīyah
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
